techmeme.title: An Arizona man was sentenced to 10.5 years in prison after his deceased victim gave an impact statement to the court via an AI-generated video (David K. Li/NBC News)
Sources: CoreWeave plans to raise ~$1.5B through a high-yield bond offering, aiming to refinance part of its massive liabilities, weeks after a muted IPO (Financial Times)
Appfigures estimates Apple's US App Store revenue from commissions was ~$10.1B in 2024, more than doubling from ~$4.76B in 2020 (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
How The Ottawa Hospital reduced clinician burnout using Microsoft's DAX Copilot, which captures conversations with patients via an app and drafts clinical notes (Taryn Plumb/VentureBeat)
Panasonic says it will cut 10,000 jobs, or 4%+ of its staff, 5,000 in Japan and 5,000 overseas, and expects ~$895M in restructuring charges this fiscal year (Yuki Furukawa/Bloomberg)
